MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 Select(int64 timeout) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function Select (timeout As Long) As Integer

Docs.param: If positive, block for up to timeout milliseconds, more or less, while waiting for a channel to become ready; if zero, block indefinitely; must not be negative
Docs.summary: Selects a set of keys whose corresponding channels are ready for I/O operations.
Docs.returns: The number of keys, possibly zero, whose ready-operation sets were updated

Docs.exception: if the given timeout argument is less than zero.
